Html:
Hello,

i use your tool for quite some time now without a flaw.

Today i wanted to push the actual flashplayer.msi and some other apps but now i get the error message from above at every single update that i want to supply.

WPP Version is 1.3.1603.29
WSUS Server is 3.2.7600.274

I`ve done some googleing but no solution fixed my problem yet so i ask here if someone have an idea?

Did you some changes int a path? Pls read this Thread: https://social.technet.microsoft.com/Forums/en-US/5fdb03a7-2605-488b-80ca-f389499ab0df/scup-failed-to-sign-package-error?forum=configmanagersecurity
It is not about WPP, but in SCUP a WSUS is integrated.

Or this Thread: https://thwack.solarwinds.com/thread/62897

No, unfortunately not.
Ive resized the partition where the shares are lying.

Since then it seems that not all updates could be downloaded and i cant deploy any package via WPP
No, since i resized the partition.
